<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Traverse the DFG and collect the set dead RefNodes and the set of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dead instructions. Return &quot;true&quot; if any of these sets is non-empty,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;false&quot; otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/rdf/deadcodeelimination/#a4c7ab56ddc8e8b9a4f7903e9268c10e9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/rdf/deadcodeelimination/#a4c7ab56ddc8e8b9a4f7903e9268c10e9">DeadCodeElimination::collect</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function works by first finding all live nodes. The dead nodes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are then the complement of the set of live nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assume that all nodes are dead. Identify instructions which must be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// considered live, i.e. instructions with observable side-effects, such</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as calls and stores. All arguments of such instructions are considered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// live. For each live def, all operands used in the corresponding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction are considered live. For each live use, all its reaching</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// defs are considered live.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LiveNodes.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/deadcodeelimination/setqueue">SetQueue&lt;NodeId&gt;</a> WorkQ;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/rdf/nodeaddr">NodeAddr&lt;BlockNode&#42;&gt;</a> BA : DFG.getFunc().<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/rdf/nodeaddr/#a150c10db309dcfa7a1093dc0c698d663">Addr</a>-&gt;members(DFG))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/rdf/nodeaddr">NodeAddr&lt;InstrNode&#42;&gt;</a> IA : BA.Addr-&gt;members(DFG))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a9c5c1abf54c7f5aaf8add770214aba5d">NodeId</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = WorkQ.<a href="/docs/api/structs/deadcodeelimination/setqueue/#a604d48521d2a6b059a788cbc591c024e">pop&#95;front</a>();</span></CodeLine>
